text.div:
BC DegreeOfLymphaticInvolvementVS ValueSet

Value set containing the degree of lymphatic involvement.

name: DegreeOfLymphaticInvolvementVS
title: BC DegreeOfLymphaticInvolvementVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Value set containing the degree of lymphatic involvement.

concept.display: Only a few cancer cells are in the node.
The cancer can be seen or felt without aid of microscopy.
Cancer has spread outside the wall of the node.
